text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
One day, as I enter the cafeteria, I<n>notice Sakura Bakushin O
sitting<n>before a gigantic mountain of food<n>with a sparkle in
her eyes.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This food will be gone before you<n>know it...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, if it isn't my observant trainer!<n>Have you come to
witness my historic<n>achievement firsthand?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, you've got FANTASTIC timing! I<n>was just about to
start practicing for<n>the real deal!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Come on, have a seat! You can watch<n>me conquer yet
another obstacle on<n>the road to GLORY!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fear not, Trainer! I'll Bakushin blast<n>this challenge into
oblivion—and soar to<n>VICTORY!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The class representative before you<n>will never bring you
shame!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Judging from her statement, there<n>seems to be some sort of
food-based<n>challenge at Tracen Academy, and<n>she's
planning to enter.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I must beat this challenge! Only then<n>can I become the TRUE
model class<n>representative!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: My opponents; one eggstralarge omelet rice, a serving of friedchicken that would make anyone bawk, and a house salad bigenough to feed a whole mansion!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
First up, my absolute favorite—MEAT!<n>I'll down these bad
birds at<n>Baw-kushin speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
After that, I'll start on the omelet rice!<n>Always an eggcellent
idea to follow<n>protein with carbs!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And at the tip of the iceberg, we havethe salad! It's just a boringsalad, so I'll save it for last!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And now all that's left is to... EAT!<n>Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I hold my tongue as I watch Sakura<n>Bakushin O push aside
the least-filling<n>dish, the salad, in favor of the heavy<n>fried
chicken...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Phew... Okay, time for a break.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The mountain of food before her<n>barely has a dent in it.
Which... makes<n>sense, seeing as she started with the<n>fried
foods and carbohydrates.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No matter how much I eat, there's still<n>so much food... Are
these magical<n>plates that keep adding more food as<n>I eat?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, your magical sabotage will not<n>hinder me! I'm a class<n>
representative, and a class<n>representative never gives up!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I will overcome this challenge and<n>show all Umamusume
that they can do<n>ANYTHING if they put their minds to it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's taking this pretty seriously, so I<n>decide to offer up
some advice.
choice_data_list: I know how you can eat faster!
I know how you can eat faster!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Y-you do?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Is there really a way for me to getfaster, even when it comes toeating?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Tell me, Trainer! Tell me so I can<n>dominate this food
challenge!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain that fried foods and<n>carbohydrates fill the stomach<n>
quicker, so it's best to start with the<n>less-filling vegetables.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Adding that eating the same thing for<n>a long time could be
boring, I also<n>suggest sampling a little bit of<n>everything
along the way.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohoho, a wise suggestion as always...<n>Thank you! In that
case, I'll make sure<n>to cram a little bit of everything in<n>
each bite!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fear not, the class representative will<n>never fail you!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: With that, she eagerly returns to her<n>food. But before long...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin... Baku... shiii—mmph!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: M-my poor jaw... I'm so sorry...
choice_data_list: That's what you get for taking such big bites.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... My cute little mouth wasn't<n>ready for the carnage I
subjected it<n>to...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Urgh... Just talking hurts... I can'tgo on...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer... the rest... is up to you...<n>Blech.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Sakura Bakushin O lays down in a<n>food-induced coma, I
pick up my<n>utensils and begin my futile effort to<n>finish
what she started.
